tweets.text:
Please tell me @ClareDinnisEA is this your gold standard regulation of a non compliant permit breaching landfill site? If it is then I seriously think we have a huge problem in the levels of competence displayed by @EnvAgencyMids

@StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/g98XqMIiDp

@EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @DrMariaNeira @antheaturner @JuliaBradbury @mwilliamsthomas 

The annoyance level for hydrogen sulphide (h2s) is 7 ugm3. 

Would anyone at the EA like to comment on why we are seeing figures as high as 1017 ugm3. 

#StopTheStink https://t.co/G4jobNaxsi
Do something @EnvAgencyMids Stop @RedIndustries2 accepting waste, cap it off @WalleysL  landfill. Monitor. #StopTheStink Do something. Stop letting Red gas the residents of Newcastle Under Lyme.

Good God Almighty, @WHO on earth @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids would sanction this ? What inhumane rush for money is this all about? Just a couple of years difference. @JuliaBradbury @DrMariaNeira @ShaunLintern @JournoJess_ @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe https://t.co/UBOWZ4zDek

@GarethSimkins @alan49479451 @a_rambling_man @BarristerSecret @JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 @Unchecked_UK @EnvAgency @TheENDSReport That‚Äôs very good news, we‚Äôve appreciated your coverage before, thank you v much. Also if you happen to know any specialists on air pollution that would be willing to work with us please could you put them in touch with me or @DrMickSalt #stopthestink

@SianieRoo @alan49479451 @a_rambling_man @BarristerSecret @JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 @Unchecked_UK @EnvAgency Indeed. At least I can say @TheENDSReport, which I write for, is on the case. I have heard some shocking things about the landfill that still have not entered the public domain. Watch this space.

tweets.text: What's going on when residents are up half the night with burning eyes, nose and throats on a regular basis and no one seems to have the power to stop it? The truth will out one day. Let's hope soon #StopTheStink @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @MattHancock

urls.title: Interaction between Environmental Permitting and local authorities‚Äô statutory nuisance duties (web version)
urls.description: We use some essential cookies to make this website work. We‚Äôd like to set additional cookies to understand how you use GOV.UK, remember your settings and improve government services. We also use cookies set by other sites to help us deliver content from their services. Where we have identified any third party copyright information you will need to obtain permission from the copyright holders concerned. This publication is available at https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/environmental-perm itting-guid

tweets.text: @a_rambling_man @BarristerSecret @JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 Big nope. The environmental permit for Walleys Quarry, issued by the Environment Agency, effectively prevents prosecution for statutory nuisance by the local council. A prosecution could only be made through the Environmental Permitting Regulations 2016. https://t.co/3KJMMWbD6T

@scruftgirl Thanks Joy, are you able to report this to our incident hotline 0800 807060 please? Our teams will need to ask a couple of questions to get all the info they need to be able to deal with it.
